title: PROOF the Democrat Agenda Is NOT About Climate | Guest: Carol Roth | 10/24/22
description:
Glenn reviews the latest craziness from over the weekend: President Biden zoned out during an MSNBC interview, China’s President Xi kicked out a former president, and the U.S. Army’s 101st Airborne division was deployed to Europe for the first time since World War II. CNN wants dogs to start eating bugs to fight climate change. Glenn and Stu review the latest midterm polls as Dr. Oz takes the lead over John Fetterman. Glenn gives an update on his team’s search for missing ABC journalist James Gordon Meek. Many of the Democrats’ top priorities seem to boil down to one goal: Reduce the population. Why is China buying up gold from the West? Financial expert Carol Roth joins to give her theory. Glenn reveals who’s behind Steve Bannon’s prison sentence and how rare it actually is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
